Package dao

Class AppointmentDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.AppointmentDAO
public class AppointmentDAO extends Object
AppointmentDAO class -- used to connect to the database and allow sql queries, create, update, and deletes.

  • Method Details

    • loadAllAppts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> loadAllAppts()
      loadAllAppts -- queries the db and gets all appointments from the appointments table
      Returns:
      returns an ObservableList of all appointments and their data from the appointments table.

    • getApptsThisWeek

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getApptsThisWeek() throws SQLException
      getApptsThisWeek -- queries the db and gets all appointments within the next 7 days from the db appointments table.
      Returns:
      -- Returns an ObservableList of all appts in the next 7 days from the db appointments table.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getApptsThisMonth

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getApptsThisMonth() throws SQLException
      getApptsThisMonth -- queries the db and gets all appointments within the next 30 days from the db appointments table.
      Returns:
      -- Returns an ObservableList of all appts in the next 30 days from the db appointments table.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • addAppointment

      public static void addAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, Timestamp createDate, User createdBy, Timestamp lastUpdate, User lastUpdatedBy, int customerId, int userId, int contactId)
      addAppointment -- Creates a new appointment/entry in the db appointments table.
      Parameters:
      title - -- appointment title
      description - -- appointment description
      location - -- appointment location
      type - -- appointment type
      start - -- start date and time
      end - -- end date and time
      createDate - -- Timestamp when appointment is created
      createdBy - -- User name that created the appointment
      lastUpdate - -- Timestamp when appointment is last updated
      lastUpdatedBy - -- User name that last updated the appointment
      customerId - -- customer ID
      userId - -- user ID
      contactId - -- contact ID

    • updateAppointment

      public static void updateAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, Timestamp lastUpdate, User lastUpdatedBy, int customerId, int userId, int contactId, int apptId)
      updateAppointment -- Updates an existing appointment/entry in the db appointments table that matches the appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      title - -- appointment title
      description - -- appointment description
      location - -- appointment location
      type - -- appointment type
      start - -- start date and time
      end - -- end date and time
      lastUpdate - -- Timestamp when appointment is last updated
      lastUpdatedBy - -- User name that last updated the appointment
      customerId - -- customer ID
      userId - -- user ID
      contactId - -- contact ID
      apptId - -- appointment Id used to update the appointment entry in the db.

    • deleteAppointment

      public static void deleteAppointment(int apptId)
      deleteAppointment -- deletes an appointment from the db appointments table that matches the appointment Id.
      Parameters:
      apptId - -- appointment ID used to delete an appointment from the db.

    • deleteAllCustomerAppts

      public static void deleteAllCustomerAppts(int customerId)
      deleteAllCustomerAppts -- deletes all appts that contain the matching customerId from the db appointments table.
      Parameters:
      customerId - -- customerId is used to find all appointments that have the customerId

    • deleteAllContactAppts

      public static void deleteAllContactAppts(int contactId)
      deleteAllContactAppts -- deletes all appts that contain the matching contactId from the db appointments table.
      Parameters:
      contactId - -- contactId is used to find all appointments that have the customerId

    • deleteAllUserAppts

      public static void deleteAllUserAppts(int userId)
      deleteAllUserAppts -- deletes all appts that contain the userId from the db appointments table.
      Parameters:
      userId - -- userId is used to find all appointments that have the userId

    • loadContactAppts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> loadContactAppts(int contactId)
      loadContactAppts -- queries the db and gets all appointments from the appointments table that match the contact ID.
      Parameters:
      contactId - -- contact ID used to get all appointments that match the contact ID.
      Returns:
      -- Returns an ObservableList of all appointments that match the contact ID.

    • loadCustomerAppts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> loadCustomerAppts(int customerId)
      loadCustomerAppts -- queries the db and gets all appointments from the appointments table that match the customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - -- customer ID used to get all appointments that match the customer ID.
      Returns:
      -- Returns an ObservableList of all appointments that match the customer ID.

    • loadTotals

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> loadTotals()
      loadTotals -- queries the db and gets a total of all appointments from the appointments table by month and type.
      Returns:
      -- Returns an ObservableList of the total appointments by month and type.
